mapper.sql: MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, FAR_MENU_ID, MENU_SEQ, FORM_ID, PRFLAG, PRGROUP, PRTYPE, PROPERTY0, PROPERTY1, PROPERTY2, PROPERTY3, PROPERTY4, PROPERTY5, PROPERTY6, PROPERTY7, PROPERTY8, PROPERTY9, PRINF, PREXP, ITIME, ISHIFT, IGROUP, IPERSON, UTIME, USHIFT, UGROUP, UPERSON, UFROM
mapper.select:
select
from com_menu
MENU_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
FAR_MENU_ID =#{farMenuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by far_menu_id,menu_seq
mapper.insert: insert into com_menu (MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, FAR_MENU_ID, MENU_SEQ, FORM_ID, PRFLAG, PRGROUP, PRTYPE, PROPERTY0, PROPERTY1, PROPERTY2, PROPERTY3, PROPERTY4, PROPERTY5, PROPERTY6, PROPERTY7, PROPERTY8, PROPERTY9, PRINF, PREXP, ITIME, ISHIFT, IGROUP, IPERSON, UTIME, USHIFT, UGROUP, UPERSON, UFROM) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{farMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{formId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prinf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ishift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{igroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iperson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ushift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ugroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uperson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ufrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update com_menu
MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAR_MENU_ID = #{farMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MENU_SEQ = #{menuSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRFLAG = #{prflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRGROUP = #{prgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRTYPE = #{prtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY0 = #{property0,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY1 = #{property1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY2 = #{property2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY3 = #{property3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY4 = #{property4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY5 = #{property5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY6 = #{property6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY7 = #{property7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY8 = #{property8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPERTY9 = #{property9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRINF = #{prinf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREXP = #{prexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITIME = #{itime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ISHIFT = #{ishift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IGROUP = #{igroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IPERSON = #{iperson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UTIME = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USHIFT = #{ushift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UGROUP = #{ugroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPERSON = #{uperson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UFROM = #{ufrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update com_menu set MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAR_MENU_ID = #{farMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MENU_SEQ = #{menuSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRFLAG = #{prflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRGROUP = #{prgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRTYPE = #{prtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY0 = #{property0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY1 = #{property1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY2 = #{property2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY3 = #{property3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY4 = #{property4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY5 = #{property5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY6 = #{property6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY7 = #{property7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY8 = #{property8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY9 = #{property9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINF = #{prinf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREXP = #{prexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITIME = #{itime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISHIFT = #{ishift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IGROUP = #{igroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IPERSON = #{iperson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UTIME = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USHIFT = #{ushift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UGROUP = #{ugroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPERSON = #{uperson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UFROM = #{ufrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.MENU_ID,a.MENU_NAME,a.FAR_MENU_ID,a.FORM_ID, a.PROPERTY0,a.PROPERTY1,b.FORM_ID as PROPERTY2 from com_menu a LEFT JOIN (select a.FORM_ID from com_org_form a, com_person_org b where a.ORG_ID = b.ORG_ID and b.PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.FORM_ID) b on a.FORM_ID = b.FORM_ID order by a.FAR_MENU_ID,a.MENU_SEQ
